scripts.open:browser: sleep 1 && echo "Opening browser at http://localhost:8080" && npx open-cli http://localhost:8080
scripts.start: npm run open:browser & concurrently --kill-others --handle-input -n RooLLM,interface -c green,cyan "npm run RooLLM" "npm run interface"
scripts.start3: npm run open:browser & concurrently --kill-others --handle-input -n RooLLM,interface -c green,cyan "npm run RooLLM3" "npm run interfac3"
